name: CopperplatePodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Copperplate Podcast”
”Alexa, start Copperplate Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Copperplate Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: copperplate podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
70 minutes of good Irish traditional music, from some of Ireland's top musicians and singers mostly on their own and indie labels. All of which are distributed and promoted by the first indie company to specialize in Irtrad. All titles are available via mail order from www.copperplatemailorder.com Payment through Pay Pal. Check out the web site for sound samples and details on over 100 great titles.
Presented by Alan O'Leary formerly of CMR Radio and Spyda Radio and driving force behind Copperplate. Feddback always welcome, enjoy the music.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Copperplate Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Copperplate Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:

The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
